Ultimo had no time for reactions to the blade tossed as he brought Guarda, his nebulan bio engineered shield to in front of the blasts.  "huh,  Chaochitan energy.  Havn't fought one like you in a couple million years." he said as he pulled Muchos, his gun over his shoulder into his hand.  

"Grenades" he said calmly 

"Online" Muchos replied.

Two tuhumps came from the rifle as grenades were pumped out at Hellpeon.
